title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.53 - Chart of accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.53 - Chart of accounts

State Regulations
A systematically arranged list of accounts applicable to
a specific concern, giving account names and numbers. A chart of accounts, accompanied by descriptions of their use and of the general operation of the
books of account, becomes a classification or manual of
accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.53

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
